name: TinyFifa
description:
TinyFifa

Local Coop Arcade Mini Game Inspired by Football (soccer). Get that special power up before you opponent does. Switch to the goaly before the ball crosses the net. Enjoy and master the chaos.

This game was made back in 2015

Features:
-  3 Changeable characters on each team
-  Power Up, appears randomly in either of the two predetermined positions after every 30 seconds, Power up gives the specific character who picked it up run faster and hit harder
- 2 Game Modes, First to reach a specific goal,  Highest Score in  a Given amount of time

Controls:
Player 1: 
Move: WASD
Change Character: V 

Player 2:
Move: Arrow Keys
Change Character: /

Credits
Sprite and music from Mother 3
Sounds form freesound.org
